idea-plugin.name: ECProperty Completion
idea-plugin.description:
ECProperty Completion

Enhance your development workflow with fully customizable code completion for *.property file type. This plugin allows you to define your own property-sets and get intelligent suggestions as you type.

Key Features:

  • Hierarchical Completion: Supports "Dot-Notation" (e.g., database. → database.url) with automatic triggering of the next suggestion level.
  • Smart Performance: Powered by a Trie (Prefix Tree) data structure for lightning-fast lookups, even with thousands of properties.
  • Rich Documentation: Display custom descriptions and default values directly in the completion popup.

How to get started:

  1. Go to Settings | Other Settings | ECProperty Completion.
  2. Add a new row.
  3. Upload: Double-click the "Properties" column or use the Upload Icon to import a JSON file.

JSON Format Example:

[
  {
    "name": "database.url",
    "description": "JDBC Connection String"
  }
]

Note: Suggestions are labeled as "[C]".
